text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Mariposa |settlement_type = Census- designated place |image_skyline = 2009-0724-CA-Mariposa.jpg |image_caption = Dusk in downtown Mariposa |image_map = Mariposa County California Incorporated and Unincorporated areas Mariposa Highlighted 0645932.svg |map_caption = Location in Mariposa County and the state of California |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = |pushpin_map = California#USA |pushpin_map_caption = |coordinates = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Mariposa |established_date = |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |unit_pref = US |area_footnotes = |area_total_sq_mi = 4.040 |area_total_km2 = |area_land_sq_mi = 4.037 |area_land_km2 = |area_water_sq_mi = 0.003 |area_water_km2 = |area_water_percent = 0.07 |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_ft = 1949 |elevation_m = 594 |population_as_of = 2020 |population_total = 1526 |population_footnotes = |population_density_sq_mi = 378.0 |population_metro = |timezone = Pacific Time Zone |utc_offset = -8 |timezone_DST = PDT |utc_offset_DST = -7 |postal_code_type = ZIP code |postal_code = 95338 |area_code_type = Area code |area_code = 209 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = |blank1_name = GNIS feature IDs |blank1_info = 1659063, 2408181 }} Mariposa (formerly Agua Fria) is a census-designated place (CDP) of California in the United States. It is the county seat of Mariposa County. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in California Category:County seats in California Category:Settlements in Mariposa County, California
title: Mariposa, California
